jetpack-related-posts.title: Annual General Meeting 2019
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The annual general meeting of Aqualis ASA will be held on 11 June 2019 at 08:00 CET at the offices of Advokatfirmaet Haavind AS atBygdøy allé 2, 0257 Oslo.
